com.appscend.overlaycontrollers

Class APSMediaPlayerImageOverlayController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.appscend.overlaycontrollers.APSMediaPlayerOverlayController
      • com.appscend.overlaycontrollers.APSMediaPlayerClosableOverlayController
        • com.appscend.overlaycontrollers.APSMediaPlayerImageOverlayController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KRAdapter

    public class APSMediaPlayerImageOverlayController
extends APSMediaPlayerClosableOverlayController
    The APSMediaPlayerImageOverlayController allows placing an image on top of video content.

    Configuration

    To create an APSMediaOverlay of image type:

    • set the overlay object's type property to APSImageOverlay

    • set the overlay object&'s properties property to a HashMap that can have the following keys and values:

      • kAPSImageOverlayClickthrough: set this key to a String representing the URL that should be launched when the overlay is tapped.
      • kAPSImageOverlayClicktracking: set this key to a ArrayList of String objects that will be tracked by the player when the overlay is tapped (see [APSMediaPlayer trackforEvent:]). Note that the kAPSImageOverlayClickthrough key must also be set for tracking to happen.
      • kAPSImageOverlayViewtracking: set this key to a ArrayList of String objects that will be tracked by the player when the overlay is displayed (see [APSMediaPlayer trackforEvent:]).
      • kAPSImageOverlayResourceURL: String representing the image to be loaded.
      • kAPSImageOverlayErrorURLs: set this key to a ArrayList of String objects that will be tracked by the player when there is an error loading the image (see [APSMediaPlayer trackforEvent:]).
      • kAPSImageOverlayBackgroundColor: the background color of the overlay. Set this to a String containing the hex color representation. Defaults to [UIColor clearColor].

      • kAPSImageOverlayStretchMode: String representing the possible ways of scaling the image in the overlay surface. Possible values are:

        • “aspectFit”, that will set the overlay’s ScaleType to ScaleType.FIT_CENTER
        • “aspectFill”, that will set the overlay’s ScaleType to ScaleType.CENTER_CROP
        • “fill”, that will set the overlay’s ScaleType to ScaleType.FIT_XY
        • “bottom”, that will set the overlay’s ScaleType to ScaleType.MATRIX and will align the elements to the bottom
        • “top”, that will set the overlay’s ScaleType to ScaleType.MATRIX and will align the elements to the top
        • “left”, that will set the overlay’s ScaleType to ScaleType.MATRIX and will align the elements to the left
        • “right”, that will set the overlay’s ScaleType to ScaleType.MATRIX and will align the elements to the right
    Author:
    Appscend
